Title: Arbitrage
Overview: A troubled hedge fund magnate, desperate to complete the sale of his trading empire, makes an error that forces him to turn to an unlikely person for help.
production_companies: Lionsgate, Artina Films, Lucky Monkey Pictures, Green Room Films, Treehouse Pictures, Alvernia Studios, LB Productions, Parlay Films
Cast: Richard Gere, Susan Sarandon, Tim Roth
